title: Ticket #6066: Make additional final node tests
description:
Make final node tests for the following special cases:
  • Final node with multiple job procs (maybe both failure and success)
  • Final node with PRE_SKIP activated
  • Final node where all submit attempts fail

Think about any other special cases we need...

Make sure DAG status in dagman.out and node status file is correct...
remarks:
2016-Dec-22 09:48:39 by wenger:
Created V8_4-gittrac_6066-branch for this.

2016-Dec-30 16:03:58 by wenger:
This is almost done, but I'm going to leave the ticket active until the tests get enabled as part of the standard nightly tests (which won't happen until the bugs get fixed, I guess).
